column6: I love being able to order more than just one dish (being a veggie) and everyone being better than the last.  Their "Pan con Tomate" is heaven.  I don't know how they do it
column7: but it takes me back to Barcelona
column8: where I went to that tiny famous restaurant where they gave me "Pan con Tomate" and I started being all frou frou and slicing the tomato and the server yelled at me for doing it wrong... He he.
